Professional Installation Process

Our certified technicians ensure perfect setup, calibration, and integration for optimal performance.

1

Pre-Installation Consultation

We assess your space, discuss your preferences, and plan the optimal placement for both display and audio components.

  • Room layout analysis
  • Viewing angle optimization
  • Audio placement planning
  • Cable routing strategy
2

Professional Mounting

Secure wall mounting with proper support and clean cable management for a professional appearance.

  • Stud location and reinforcement
  • Level mounting with precision
  • In-wall cable routing
  • Power outlet installation if needed
3

Audio System Setup

Strategic placement and configuration of Sonos speakers for optimal sound distribution and performance.

  • Soundbar positioning and connection
  • Subwoofer placement optimization
  • Surround speaker installation
  • Wireless network configuration
4

System Integration

Connect all components and integrate with your existing smart home systems for seamless operation.

  • HDMI eARC configuration
  • Smart home integration
  • Voice control setup
  • Multi-room audio configuration
5

Calibration & Testing

Professional calibration of both video and audio systems ensures optimal performance in your specific environment.

  • TV picture calibration
  • Sonos Trueplay tuning
  • Audio level balancing
  • System functionality testing
6

User Training

Comprehensive training on all features and controls ensures you can enjoy your new system to its fullest potential.

  • Remote control operation
  • Sonos app navigation
  • Voice control commands
  • Troubleshooting basics
